name: ObservationSubtype
title: observationSubtype
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the observation sub-type.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBX segment.

concepts.definition: Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies observations that give overall culture outcome, when no specific organism is being named.
Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies any other observations about the isolate.
Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies growth levels of an isolate â€“ can be numeric or categorical.
Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies observations that name a specific organism either at the species or the genus level.
Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies observations that do not fit the culture status, but is not at the isolate level.
Sub-type of RSLT (Result) This term identifies observations on gram stains (and other stains or smears) on the clinical sample.
